1 Timothy__03.2__Of one wife: The meaning is not that every bishop should have a wife (for St. Paul himself had none), but that no one should be admitted to the holy orders of bishop, priest, or deacon, who had been married more than once.
1 Timothy__03.6__A neophyte: That is, one lately baptized, a young convert.
1 Timothy__03.15__The pillar and ground of the truth: Therefore the church of the living God can never uphold error, nor bring in corruptions, superstition, or idolatry.
